projects.title: AI Espresso
projects.description:
AI Espresso is my operator-first newsletter where AI becomes usable structure, not noise. It's framed through a Fallout-inspired world, with me as the barista-guide serving "espresso shots" of clarity: practical frameworks, checklists, and real examples to help founders and teams make better decisions, build stronger systems, and execute with less fragility.

No trend-chasing. Just disciplined AI for real work, plus an optional Advanced Vault for deeper technical and strategic layers.

Results: 16th fastest growing newsletter worldwide on Substack, with 6,000+ readers acquired in less than 6 months.

projects.title: Automazione Vincente

Results: Ensures no email ends up in spam, recovers 30% more abandoned carts, and increases the lifetime value of every single customer.

projects.title: DSYRE School
projects.description:
The first projects I worked on in my career were infoproducts and video courses. Over the years, my team and I have developed great skills in launching online schools and academies.

Given this past and my passion for the gaming world, together with our partner Dsyre, a rapidly growing Italian Esports Team, we opened the doors to the online training academy for Gamers by launching the first course in July 2022: "Warzone Masterplayer".

projects.title: Lead by Neo
projects.description:
We are an Artificial Intelligence Consulting Agency. We take care of generating highly profiled appointments for our partners.

Our promise: "We use the power of Artificial Intelligence to enable our partners to effortlessly generate a continuous flow of high-quality appointments and leads in less than 60 days, bypassing the limitations and inefficiencies of traditional lead generation approaches."

manifesto.intro1: I don't build for speed alone.
manifesto.p1: Most problems aren't solved by more tools or automation. They're solved by clarity: seeing the system as it is, naming the trade-offs, and choosing a direction you can stand behind.
manifesto.p2: Clarity is not a soft skill. It's an ethical act. Because unclear decisions create fragility, waste time, and quietly erode trust.
manifesto.p3: Technology matters only when it becomes usable structure. Not novelty. Not performance theater. Structure that reduces load, strengthens execution, and elevates people.
manifesto.p4: I work like an operator, not a spectator. Where complexity is real and consequences exist. Where decisions can't be postponed or disguised as experimentation.
manifesto.principle3: Systems that don't respect humans eventually break.
manifesto.closing: The real advantage today is not moving faster, but deciding better. Building things that last. Leaving people, projects, and organizations stronger than I found them.
manifesto.midasQuote: "Everything I touch should leave better than it was before."
